summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2011 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 16V384000 (AIR BAGS) FOR THE PASSENGER FRONTAL AIR BAG INFLATOR; HOWEVER, THE PARTS TO DO THE REPAIR WERE UNAVAILABLE. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURER EXCEEDED A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. THE LOCAL DEALER (STAR FORD LINCOLN LOCATED ON 1101 S BRAND BLVD, GLENDALE, CA, 91204) SCHEDULED AN APPOINTMENT FOR THE RECALL REPAIR. UPON TAKING THE VEHICLE IN TO BE REPAIRED, THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE RECALL PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED AND STATED THAT PARTS WERE NOT AVAILABLE WHERE A CASE CONTINUED TO BE OPENED AND CLOSED PER CASE NUMBERS: CAS-12412527-Z5V3N9, CRM: 00720000000517, AND CAS-12372127-Q8L9Y3 ALONG WITH COMMUNICATION VIA EMAIL. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
